title: Pointers
concept: This level introduces pointers in C: pointer declaration, dereferencing, passing by reference to functions, and simple pointer arithmetic with arrays.

challenges.title: Pointer to Integer
challenges.description: Use a pointer to read an integer and print it using dereferencing.

challenges.title: Swap using Pointers
challenges.description: Write a function swap(int *a, int *b) to swap values. Print a and b after swapping.
challenges.outputDescription: Swapped a and b separated by space.

challenges.title: Sum using Pointer to Array
challenges.description: Calculate sum of array elements using a pointer to traverse.

challenges.title: Max of Array using Pointer
challenges.description: Find maximum element using pointer to array.

challenges.title: Count Even Using Pointer
challenges.description: Count how many even numbers are there using pointers.

challenges.title: Pointer Increment Demo
challenges.description: Given N and N integers, use pointer arithmetic to print every element.

challenges.title: String Length using Pointer
challenges.description: Find length of a string using char pointer.

challenges.title: Modify via Pointer
challenges.description: Read integer n and pointer should add 10 to it and print.

challenges.title: Array Element by Address
challenges.description: Read N and N integers. Then read an index i and print element at that index using pointer arithmetic.

challenges.title: Swap Array Ends using Pointers
challenges.description: Swap first and last elements of an array using pointers and print resulting array.
